trager2022moral.title: The Moral Foundations Reddit Corpus
trager2022moral.author: Jackson Trager and Alireza S. Ziabari and Aida Mostafazadeh Davani and Preni Golazizian and Farzan Karimi-Malekabadi and Ali Omrani and Zhihe Li and Brendan Kennedy and Nils Karl Reimer and Melissa Reyes and Kelsey Cheng and Mellow Wei and Christina Merrifield and Arta Khosravi and Evans Alvarez and Morteza Dehghani
trager2022moral.paperMotivationText: To facilitate improving our understanding of the role of moral rhetoric beyond Twitter
trager2022moral.paperContributionText: A new, annotated resource for MFT: the Moral Foundations Reddit Corpus, a collection of 16,123 English Reddit comments that have been curated from 12 distinct subreddits, hand-annotated by at least three trained annotators for 8 categories of moral sentiment
trager2022moral.paperResultsText: Baseline moral-sentiment classification results for this new corpus
